import React from 'react'; import './Widget.css'; const outer = { height: '100vh', display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center', }; const inner = { flex: 'none', maxWidth: '700px', textAlign: 'center', border: '3px solid rgba(166,128,184,1)', padding: '100px', position: 'relative' }; const answer = { padding: '2% 5%', minWidth: '300px', minHeight: '40px', width: '90%', height: '40px', fontSize: '16px' } const btnSection = { position: 'relative', margin: '30px 0', minWidth: '500px' } const backBtn = { width: '100px', height: '40px', fontSize: '12px', position: 'absolute', left: 0, background: 'rgba(213,232,212,1)', border: '2px solid rgba(130,179,102,1)' } const nextBtn = { width: '100px', height: '40px', fontSize: '12px', position: 'absolute', right: 0, background: 'rgba(213,232,212,1)', position: 'relative', border: '2px solid rgba(192,217,178,1)', margin: '8px' } const Widget = (props) => (

{props.question}

{props.previousExists ? : ''} {props.isLast ? : }
); export default Widget
